resources.string: Prevent Wechat from recalling chat messages or deleting moments.

Supported Features:
 	1. Prevent friends from recalling messages.
 	2. Prevent friends from deleting moments or comments.
 	Support WeChat 6.5.13 and will keep updating.
 
 Credits:
 	@rovo89 for the awesome Xposed framework.
 	@rarnu for the prototype module wechat_no_revoke.
